title: Ticket #763: configure.ac only detects libvirt library not headers, build fails
description:
Reports are when building with libvirt library installed but no libvirt headers that configure passes and compilation of libvirt code fails, missing headers.

Inspection of the configure.ac shows it does a lib check but not a header check. Both need to be done.
check_ins: 2009-Sep-23 10:55   Check-in [15733]: configure.ac now checks for libvirt headers as well as the library (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: matt
